text: Futhi nibambelele ngokuqina nonke kanyekanye entanjeni kaMvelinqangi (Islam) ningehlukani futhi nikhumbule ububele bukaMvelinqangi phezu kwenu ngesikhathi nibe naniyizitha (somunye nomunye) wabe esehlanganisa izinhliziyo zenu, ngobubele bakhe nabe seniba abazalwane futhi nanisengcupheni yomgodi womlilo, wabe esenihlenga kuwona kanjalo uMvelinqangi uwenza acace amavesi akhe kunina ukuthi ningaholeleka (endleleni eqondile)
